alert.note: Alert for Jones (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 09 at 8:28PM CST until further notice by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Mississippi... Tallahala Creek At Laurel affecting Jones County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Tallahala Creek at Laurel. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 13 feet, Agricultural and lowland flooding is becoming more widespread along and near the creek. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:45 PM CST Tuesday the stage was 3.1 feet and rising. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early Sunday afternoon and continue rising. Additional rises will be possible . - Flood stage is 13.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (6 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Wed Thu Fri Tallahala Creek Laurel 13.0 3.1 Tue 7 pm CST 2.7 3.6 6.4 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued by 9am tomorrow morningWednesday morning at 830 AM CST.
